attributes.action: Install decent air conditioning on London tubes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To use the tube can be an unpleasant experience due to overcrowdedness and more. However, the experience is worse when the tubes are hot and stuffy. The Central Line is one prime example. Passengers pay more than enough for a ticket so it's high time we started seeing something done for us.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Transport for London and the Mayor of London
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
